ctu_text: "}, {"question": "How Often Does The Committee Meet To Make Decisions, And How Are These Decisions Reached? ", "answer": "The committee generally meets once a quarter or more frequently as needed, and the decisions are made based on the majority of votes among the present members. "}, {"question": "Who Are The Members Of The Taluka Level Committee Responsible For Selecting Master Trainers/Instructors? ", "answer": "The committee consists of the CDPO (Child Development Project Officer) of the concerned ICDS (Integrated Child Development Services) Block, who serves as the Chairperson, along with one Mukya Sevika and two Anganwadi Workers from the Department of Women and Child Development as members.
